Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1965...
Injured on 7/8/1965 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Cincinnati to New York (N) on 6/12/1966 (Going to CIN: P J. Miller, P R. Craig. Going to NYM: 2B H. Yamazaki, P D. Sutherland)...
Traded from New York (N) to Cincinnati on 2/13/1970 (Going to CIN: 2B H. Yamazaki. Going to NYM: P T. Metcalf)...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1970, off Ray Jarvis (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/28/1970, off Pete Richert (PHI)...
Injured on 6/17/1972 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Chicago (N) on 7/9/1972...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Pittsburgh on 6/3/1973...
Injured on 5/14/1976 with a Broken Foot, out for full season...
Injured on 4/19/1979 with a Broken Foot, out for 5 weeks...
